title: Tiger Aspect - Wikipedia
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions (formerly known as Tiger Television from 1988 until 1993 and also known as Tiger Aspect Films for theatrical films) is a British television and film production company, particularly noted for its situation comedies. Founded by Peter Bennett-Jones, its productions have ...

title: Aspect Film & Television - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Aspect Film & Television was a British television production company that was formed in 1979 by Paul Sommers. It produced critically acclaimed documentaries and some TV shows.

title: Aspect Film & Television (UK) | Closing Logo Group | Fandom
snippet: Background: Aspect Film & Television was a British television production company that was formed in 1979 by Paul Sommers. It produced critically acclaimed documentaries and some TV shows.

title: Tiger Aspect Productions - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions is a British film and television production company of Peter Bennett-Jones, founded in 1993 from the merger between Tiger Television and Aspect Film & Television.
